name: The Eyes of Doom-MD
description:
Story:

Magical creatures like giant eyes appeared and devastated the land.

Armies had been destroyed and kingdoms fell.

None can stop them.

In their despair all the Wizards of world gathered for one last act.

They will gather all the remaining life force of the planet to a single point.

They will win or they will loose it all.

It’s time to face The Eyes of Doom for one last time.

Description:

The game is a side scrolling shoot em up created for the Sega Mega Drive / Genesis thanks to the superb SGDK.

The zip file eyes_of_doom.zip is the rom of the game. You can play it with any emulator for the Sega Mega Drive / Genesis.

Alternatively the eyes_of_doom_win.zip includes the BlastEm emulator and the rom of the game with a batch file (.bat) that you can run to play the game.

Controls:

Arrows to move.

A button to shoot.

Enter the Start button.

Good luck.

P.S. The game was created in 5 days for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3
